src_original: tathāvidhasya sarvajñapratipādakasya nityāgamasyābhāvāt /  yaccopaniṣadādau sarvajñapratipādakavākyaṃ tasyānyārthatvaṃ draṣṭavyam /  na ca nityavākyasyānityasarvajñatvapratipādakatvam,  nirviṣayatvaprasaṅgāt /  kiṃ ca yadyaṅgīkṛto nityāgamaḥ,
na cāpyevaṃ paro nityaḥ śakyo labdhumihāgamaḥ /  dṛṣṭaścedarthavādatvaṃ tatpare syādanityatā //  āgamasya ca nityatve siddhe tatkalpanā vṛthā /  yatastaṃ pratipatsyante dharmameva tato narāḥ /
na cāgamavidhiḥ kaścinnityaḥ sarvajñabodhakaḥ /  ityādi saptacatvāriṃśat ślokāḥ saprapañcametamarthaṃ pratipādayanti /
